latest: **Early Access**: the End User Separation for department spaces. **Security**: 0-Click Zendesk Account Takeover Vulnerability Enables Access to all Zendesk Tickets - CyberSecurityNews.
weekly: **New Features**: enhanced dynamic filtering for lookup relationships, API support for WhatsApp Flows, import enhancements for the Exchange and Gmail connectors, plus 1 more. **Service Issues**: 4 incidents/maintenance.
monthly: **New Features**: a new approach to email authentication, the new external Oauth page in Admin Center and the excluded terms enhancement to AI-generated translations. **Security**: Developer update: Enhanced security guidelines for third-party apps, integrations, and bots. **Service Issues**: 4 incidents/maintenance.

release_notes.summary: Copilot: auto assist can now suggest existing macros to agents. AI Agents Advanced: improved dialogue builder UI for hiding/disabling parameter branches.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-08-22
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
AI Agents Advanced
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
